ygData.subject: RE: avoiding heal/taunt (Was: Begging taunt)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... My bard and my enchanter use Bind Wounds. My druid s traveling partner, a monk, does as well. The main reason NOT to do Bind Wounds is if you can t afford
ygData.messageBody:
>Just a question... does anyone but me use Bind wounds?

>Mines around 100ish and I do 25ish a Bind Im told. But I almost
>never hear of anyone, other clerics included, who bother with it.
>If not, why not?

>Shannyn

My bard and my enchanter use Bind Wounds. My druid's traveling partner,
a monk, does as well.

The main reason NOT to do Bind Wounds is if you can't afford to
buy the bandages. However, I think that Bind Wounds could come
in handy for ANYONE.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 14 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 18 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 8 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro
(Blackburrow)
